DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To delineate effect MSM osteoarthritis large joint . Design : Randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial include intervention placebo group . One hundred men woman , hip and/or knee OA divide 2 group . Intervention either MSM 3 gr twice day 26 week ( 6 gr/day total ) one group placebo . Outcomes measured Western Ontario McMaster University Osteoarthritis Index visual analogue scale ( WOMAC ) , patient physician assessment SF-36 ( overall health-related quality life ) .
